title: Market share of the global luggage market 2015 , by company
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Company, and Market share in each Company on the y axis.
The Market share is highest at Company Samsonite International SA and lowest at Company Shanghai Taifeng Cases Co Ltd.
The difference of Market share between the highest and lowest Company is 16.7.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 10 number of Companys.
Company Samsonite International SA has the highest Market share and Shanghai Taifeng Cases Co Ltd has the lowest Market share.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Company, and Market share in each Company on the y axis.
The Market share is highest at Company Samsonite International SA and lowest at Company Shanghai Taifeng Cases Co Ltd.
The difference of Market share between the highest and lowest Company is 16.7.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Company in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
The maximum Market share 17.3 is found at Company Samsonite International SA and the minimum is found at Shanghai Taifeng Cases Co Ltd where Company is 0.6.
Company LVMH Moët Hennessy Louis Vuitton SA has the second highest value for Market share.
The Market share of Company Shanghai Taifeng Cases Co Ltd is 28.83% smaller than the maximum value at Samsonite International SA.
Market share at Company Samsonite International SA is 17.3 , second place is LVMH Moët Hennessy Louis Vuitton SA at 5.0, and thirdly is Delsey SA at 2.0.
Company VF Corp, and Tumi Holdings Inc have a similar Market share that is 1.3.
The highest value 17.3 at Samsonite International SA is almost 5.34 times larger than the average value 3.24.
Summing up the values of all Companys, we get total 32.4.

data.Company: LVMH Moët Hennessy Louis Vuitton SA
